name: HOLY TULSI FACE CREME  1.7 oz. ™
description:
Our rich, luxurious face creme combines the Indian 
Ayurvedic herb, Tusli (Indian Holy Basil), known for 
its healing and cleansing properties, with carrot 
seed, jojoba and comfrey. This super hydrating creme is rich with a variety of powerful antioxidants that penetrate below the skin’s surface to fight damaging free radicals, hydrate, smooth and soften skin.

name: EYE CREAM  0.85 oz. ™
description: With Amla, Turmeric & Evening Primrose Our smooth, fragrance-free eye treatment combines Indian Ayurvedic herbs, Amla and Turmeric, with Evening Primrose to hydrate and strengthen the fragile eye area. Amla and Turmeric are powerful antioxidants that smooth out skin tones and strengthen the skin's elasticity, while Evening Primrose, high in gamma-linolenic acid (an essential fatty acid), nourishes and hydrates. Fast absorbing enough to be worn under concealer, yet potent enough to ben an effective nighttime treatment, this soothing creme can be used for all occasions, whenever skin needs extra attention and care.

name: BOTANICAL BODY GLOW LOTION  8 oz. ™
description:
Our smooth body lotion has a unique combination of ingredients that provide an array of healing and moisturizing benefits.  These ingredients include  German Chamomile, Green Tea, and Chickweed to Slippery Elm, Nettle Leaf, Marshmallow Root, and 
Hemp Seed (to name a few)..

name: NEEM ACNE MASK  4 oz. ™
description: Neem Acne Mask is a blend formulated to heal existing  acne breakouts and prevent future acne breakouts.  Neem Acne Mask infuses the skin with minerals that are vital in strengthening cells.  Neem Acne Mask integrates moisture to stop the overproduction of oil, leaving the skin smooth and supple.  Mix with egg yolk for best results

name: AMLA ANTI-WRINKLE  MASK  4 oz. ™
description: Amla Anti-Wrinkle Mask is formulated to remove dead skin cells, infuse live skin cells with natural potent minerals and vitamins, and restore the balance of moisture throughout the skins surface leaving it smooth and supple.  Amla Anti-Wrinkle Mask softens fine lines and wrinkles and rebuilds the skins strength and flexibility.  Mix with egg yolk for best results.

name: NEEM EXFOLIATING SCRUB 4 oz. ™
description: With Neem, Rose, Sandalwood, Lemon & Orange. Our scrub contains a unique array of herbs that deeply cleanse and exfoliate skin. Our powder scrub is ground finely enough not to irritate sensitive skin, yet is course enough to properly exfoliate. Neem cleanses below the skin's surface purifying blood and detoxifying skin, while rose and sandalwood gently hydrate. Neem's naturally occurring medical properties combat acne and irritated skin by cleansing, soothing, healing and firming tissues. Lemon and Orange act as astringents speeding up skin renewal and uncovering a fresh layer of skin.

name: ROJA SPRAY  4 oz. ™
description: Roja Spray is used to complete the cleansing process and maintain maximum moisture and penetration for masks and scrubs. The essence of rose reduces puffiness around the eyes, diminishes fine lines, and other signs of aging.  Roja Spray can be used as a protective layer between skin and makeup.

name: CLAY MIXING BOWL
description: Clay Bowl used to mix our masks. It is convenient and easy to use.  It is the perfect size to hold one mixture of mask.
